result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Mailed to DE & Amy A. E-file: DA & Atty. hml
signed by RMW on 9/15/21.  Body only, statewide.  ala   c: SCSO

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Holly Elkin Rockow, NONA by def. Case called at 8:56 a.m. Court notes this matter is set for a pre trial conference. DE does not appear. Clerk called the hall and does not appear via zoom. Also notes bond is unsigned and attempts have been made by Clerks. State is requesting a warrant. Due to non appearance, Court will issue a warrant Statewide, body only.
from Clerk of Court to DE requesting DE signature on bond and return 2 copies of bond in the SASE by 9/15/21. Bond mailed to the DE on 8/12/21. c: SCSO unsigned bond  gll
Pre-trial conference on September 15, 2021 at 08:45 am.

Bond on file.

  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  A.A.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:54 PM  CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. ADA:  Holly Elkin Rockow        Sheldon John Erickson appeared by video via Zoom. DE confirms address and DOB. Court reviews file. DE posted purge and given NTA for today. DE confirms address and states he currently doesn't have a phone. Bond argument. Court advises of rights. DE would like to proceed without atty. Court sets PTC. Defendant requests to appear by Zoom at next hearing. Court will not allow a Zoom appearance, as DE will need to meet with DA to see if there's a resolution. Adjourned at 1:58 PM.  gll  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 15, 2021 at 08:45 am.

Pre-trial conference on June 24, 2015 at 09:15 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  A. Armstrong.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: CAR, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Michael E. Nieskes   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Sheldon John Erickson appeared from jail.   Includes 15CM218, 15TR1566 & 15TR1568.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on all Counts.  Waives speedy trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 09:15 am.
